replies.bodyText: The short name could still be empty or too short as we don’t have a database constraint here, I guess this check does not harm!

timeline.bodyText: Can never be null, because Spring does not allow null values for @RequestBody (default behavior).
timeline.author: ungaralex

timeline.bodyText: Is this change really correct? I am not sure but I thought the previous version remove all whitespaces, right?

replies.bodyText: Only spaces. What happens to other whitespaces?

replies.bodyText:
I think we should change the previous line to
studentIds = studentIds.replaceAll("\\s+", "");

timeline.bodyText:
Is the todo really resolved? If yes, we can keep the comment as documentation, right?
If not, we should keep it.

replies.bodyText:
Yes, this was resolved about two months ago, when we merged the triggerUpdate parameters for build plan updates.
I removed the TODO and updated the comment to fit the current implementation
